text: Disepalum plagioneurum (synonym Polyalthia pingpienensis)Plants of the World Online (POWO): Disepalum plagioneurum (Diels) D.M.Johnson (retrieved 4 April 2020) is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is found in China and northern Viet Nam.China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Polyalthia pingpienensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. ==References== pingpienensis Category:Endemic flora of China Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Disepalum plagioneurum
